SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.student.tmdbts.search_engine.storage_barrels

Class StorageBarrelsImpl

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
pt.uc.dei.student.tmdbts.search_engine.storage_barrels.StorageBarrelsImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Remote, GatewayCallback, StorageBarrels
public class StorageBarrelsImpl extends UnicastRemoteObject implements StorageBarrels, GatewayCallback
Class that represents the storage barrels

The storage barrels are the components that store the index and the URLs. They also handle the search requests. The storage barrels are connected to the server through the Gateway. They also listen for messages that come from the multicast protocol. The storage barrels are also responsible for storing the search frequency of a term. The storage barrels also store the recent searches. The storage barrels are also responsible for storing the URL information.

See Also:
